content.text:
The ________ can be directly attributed to the <image 1>, because differential ability to access the internet leads directly to a differential ability to use the knowledge found on the internet.

A. Digital divide
B. Knowledge gap
C. Feminist perspective
D. E-gap

The correct answer is:

A. Digital divide

The image illustrates the concept of the digital divide, which is the gap between people who have access to modern information and communications technology and those who don't. This directly relates to the differential ability to access the internet and, consequently, the knowledge available online.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
